guide.step.basicSelect.desc: Learn how to select required fields and records from a table.
guide.step.groupBy: Aggregation and Grouping: GROUP BY / HAVING
guide.step.groupBy.desc: Master COUNT, SUM, AVG and other aggregate functions.
guide.step.join.desc: This is crucial for both DSE exams and real-world work.
guide.step.orderBy: Sorting and Limiting: ORDER BY / LIMIT
guide.step.orderBy.desc: Learn to control result order and limit data retrieval.
guide.step.subquery.desc: Learn to use subqueries in FROM / WHERE clauses for flexible solutions.
guide.subtitle: A comprehensive SQL learning roadmap designed for DSE students, from basics to advanced topics including SELECT, JOIN, GROUP BY, subqueries, and Python data processing.
